## MessageDetails.LoggedInSystemInfo type

System-level information when a user is logged in.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type LoggedInSystemInfo = {
        DAYS_TO_PASSWORD_EXPIRY: number;
        FAILED_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS: number;
        HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL_SECS: number;
        LAST_LOGIN_DATETIME: number;
        NOTIFY_EXPIRY?: boolean;
        PRODUCT?: any[];
        SYSTEM?: any;
    };
```
